app.name: codemap
app.one_liner: A project brain for your AI that gives LLMs instant architectural context without burning tokens.

screens.name: CLI Output View
screens.purpose: Display structured project context including file trees, dependency flows, or diffs based on user flags.

rust_commands.name: codemap_run
rust_commands.purpose: Execute the main codemap command to generate project context output in various modes.

rust_commands.name: codemap_handoff
rust_commands.purpose: Generate a cross-agent handoff summary for AI collaboration.

rust_commands.name: codemap_diff
rust_commands.purpose: Show files changed versus main branch or specified reference.

rust_commands.name: codemap_deps
rust_commands.purpose: Analyze and display dependency flow within the project.

mvp_plan: week 1: Implement core CLI parsing and file scanning
acceptance_tests: CLI successfully outputs project tree with default settings
Filtering by extension (--only) correctly limits output
Diff mode (--diff) shows only changed files vs main
Handoff command generates valid cross-agent summary
Dependency mode (--deps) displays correct import relationships
